ComicInfo.Title: City Fall Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
A normal night on the town for Raphael and Casey turns deadly when the Foot Clan appears in full force. The resulting chaos is only the first step in Shredder's master plan! The stakes have never been higher, and lives are on the line. Don't miss the start of the biggest story arc to hit the TMNT yet!
*List of Covers and their Creators* | Cover | Cover Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Mateus Santolouco | 1 | | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman | 6 | | RI A | Retailer Incentive A | Declan Shalvey | 7 | | RI B | Retailer Incentive B | Kevin Eastman | Missing | | RE | Retailer Exclusive Cover - Larry's Comics and Jetpack Comics Hyper Color | Rich Woodall | 3 | | RE | Retailer Exclusive Cover - Larry's Comics and Jetpack Comics Sketch Cover | Rich Woodall | 4 | | RE | Retailer Exclusive Cover - Phantom Variant | Rich Woodall | 5 | | 2nd | 2nd Printing | Kevin Eastman | 2 |
*Notes:* The Retailer's Exclusive Covers are a homage of the cover of The Incredible Hulk #340.
